description: For now, it seems like the best note app for nextcloud. Really like it.
summary: Great notetaking app, great nextcloud integration

description: I dont know any of this!
This app is nice and easy to use
The app icon is the worst, it is almost faded out and does not look like it is a Notes app, but this is an awesome Notes app! Please replace for something better.
summary: Great Notes app - just fix the app icon

description:
Fail! Lubuntu 18.04.4LTS

1) Installed and got no errors but found no way to start the application, nothing in the applications Menu or Application Launcher bar.

2) Ubuntu is listed as one of the distros it will work under and since Lubuntu is essentially Ubuntu, I am wondering if it will only work on Ubuntu because of some dependency, but that's speculation.

3) Can't make a judgement if it fails to install properly.

4) Final outcome: Uninstalled
great and feature-full notetaking app with consistent updates.
summary: Great app. Even better with Nextcloud integration

description: Its exactly what I was looking for. Fast notes app with Nextcloud support
I really like this app. But I also think that they should replace this icon. This is one of the worst looking icons on my desktop..
summary: cool note taking app. Nice & easy. But the icon needs to be changed

description: I found lots of options for note keeping in this application. It has everything I was looking for with to do option as well.
Very complete note taking app with lots of features.
summary: Very complete note taking app with lots of features

description:
Amazing. WYSIWYG editor is very well done.
Not only is the edit panel a WYSIWYG editor, you also have a Preview panel with the markdown output.
Also supports sub-directories, something I wasn't aware was possible with Nextcloud Notes.
Also supports tags, although I'm not sure those are synced to the cloud?
summary: Great app, exactly what I was looking for!

description:
Auf Anhieb funktioniert alles gut und sieht ganz gut aus. Die Einbindung in die eigene Cloud funktioniert problemlos, der vorhandene Notizordner wird korrekt erkannt und eingebunden. Ein VIM Modus ist aktivierbar. Optisch und funktional könnte man sich noch etwas von Boostnote abschauen, z.B. dass ein Codeblock in Spalte 3 eine Kopierfunktion anbietet. 
Und was dringend deutlicher herausgestellt werden sollte: Das Programm führt selbst KEINE SYNCRONISATION aus. Das überlässt es Nextcloud Sync Clients. Das kann allerdings hart verwirren und zu Sync Fehlern führen. Bitte deutlich darauf hinweisen, danke! Auf der HP steht es, wenn man sucht.

Je cherchais une alternative à Onenote, je suis comblé !
Merci !

Joplin 在 linux 与 Android 上 都会有同步的问题(每次启动/同步 都会从远程拉取所有文件, 即便这些文件在本地都已经是站最新的. 这样 文件较多时就经常报错, 请求次数过多 受限, 导致同步不完全), 而在 win10 上 没有这样的问题.

试下, 不知 QOwnNotes 的同步功能有没有这样的问题.

---------------------------------------

已用. QOwnNotes 的 Webdev 同步功能目前只支持 自部署的 Nextcloud & ownCloud, 不支持坚果云. 还得继续回到 Joplin.
summary: 不知 QOwnNotes 的同步功能相比 Joplin 怎么样?
